uk.co.dancowan.robots.ui.views.commandConsole
Class CommandLineShell

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.dancowan.robots.ui.views.commandConsole.CommandLineShell

public class CommandLineShell
extends java.lang.Object

Widget class creates a Shell without trim and places it over the last line of the StyledText instance.

Pressing enter in the Command Console view opens this shell and passes the focus. Hitting enter or loss of focus passes the command to the CommandLine instance, hitting escape just closes the shell.

Since:
version 1.0.0
Author:
Dan Cowan

CommandLineShell

public CommandLineShell(CommandLine commandLine,
                        org.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText targetControl,
                        org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Point absLocation)
C'tor.

Creates and opens a shell to receive commands in text, then processes the command.

Parameters:
commandLine - CommandLine object which will execute the command
targetControl - StyledText widget which will display the command
absLocation - Point the locations to open the shell
